verses.verse: <S%G2228><s%> Know ye <S%G50>not,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them that <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3551>law,)<s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> hath dominion <S%G2961>over<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1909><s%> as long <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G5550><s%> he <S%G2198>liveth?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> which hath an <S%G5220>husband<s%> is <S%G1210>bound<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> to her <S%G435>husband<s%> so long as he <S%G2198>liveth;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G435>husband<s%> be <S%G599>dead,<s%> she is <S%G2673>loosed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of her <S%G435>husband.<s%>

So <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1437>if,<s%> while her <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2198>liveth,<s%> she be <S%G1096>married<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> she shall be <S%G5537>called<s%> an <S%G3428>adulteress:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> her <S%G435>husband<s%> be <S%G599>dead,<s%> she <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> that <S%G3551>law;<s%> so that <S%G846>she<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3428>adulteress,<s%> though she be <S%G1096>married<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man.<s%>

Wherefore, <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are become <S%G2289>dead<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> should be <S%G1096>married<s%> to <S%G2087>another,<s%> even to him who is <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we should bring forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> unto <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3804>motions<s%> of <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> did <S%G1754>work<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> to bring forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> unto <S%G2288>death.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> we are <S%G2673>delivered<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> that being <S%G599>dead<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we were <S%G2722>held;<s%> <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> should <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2538>newness<s%> of <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in the <S%G3821>oldness<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter.<s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> Is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin?<s%> God <S%G1096>forbid.<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G235>Nay,<s%> I had <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G5037>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>known<s%> <S%G1939>lust,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> had <S%G3004>said,<s%> Thou shalt <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1937>covet.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G2716>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> all <S%G3956>manner<s%> of <S%G1939>concupiscence.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> was <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

For <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> was <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4218>once:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G326>revived,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was ordained <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3427>I<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> to <S%G3778>be<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>taking<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G1818>deceived<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G615>slew<s%> me.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>just,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good.<s%>

Was <S%G3767>then<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> unto <S%G1698>me?<s%> God <S%G1096>forbid.<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G235>But<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it might <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2716>working<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> in <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> that which is <S%G18>good;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2596>exceeding<s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G268>sinful.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4559>carnal,<s%> <S%G4097>sold<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2716>do<s%> I <S%G1097>allow<s%> <S%G3756>not:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>would,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G4238>do<s%> I <S%G3756>not;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3404>hate,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> I.

If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> I <S%G4852>consent<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it is <S%G2570>good.<s%>

Now <S%G3570><s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> it is no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> that <S%G2716>do<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> that <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> (that <S%G5123>is,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,)<s%> <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> good <S%G18>thing:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> to <S%G2309>will<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> with <S%G3427>me;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> how to <S%G2716>perform<s%> that which is <S%G2570>good<s%> I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3756>not.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>not:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> I <S%G4238>do.<s%>

I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> a <S%G3551>law,<s%> that, when <S%G1698>I<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> with <S%G1698>me.<s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G4913>delight<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2080>inward<s%> man: <S%G444><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3196>members,<s%> warring <S%G497>against<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> bringing me into <S%G163>captivity<s%> <S%G3165><s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> which <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3196>members.<s%>

O <S%G5005>wretched<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that <S%G1473>I<s%> am! <S%G5101>who<s%> shall <S%G4506>deliver<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2288>death?<s%>

I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%> <S%G686>So<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G848>myself<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>
